relationships.description: The Death Eater is attacking Harry, trying to get the prophecy from him.
Sirius is fighting a Death Eater, trying to protect Harry and his friends.
Kingsley is fighting two Death Eaters at once, helping to defend Harry and his friends.
Tonks is firing spells down at Bellatrix, trying to help protect Harry and his friends.
Neville lunged out to attack the Death Eater holding Harry, using Hermione's wand to do so.
